jobs.Notes:
Looking for Animators willing to relocate to their studio in Kilkenny for the duration of the contract on "Pete the Cat", with experience in a fast pace animation production.
Candidates must have at least one year experience on digital TV series projects.
Good knowledge of Moho (previously Anime Studio Pro) software would be preferable but is not required. Otherwise, experience in another Digital 2D Animation Software such as CelAction or ToonBoom (bone animation) and/or CGI experience with Maya or 3D Max are required. 
Starting ASAP until September 2018

Please email your application including links to your online portfolio and/or demo-reel to jobs@cartoonsaloon.ie and specify 'PTC_Animator_application_your name" in the Subject.

Job description and requirements for the feature film "Wolfwalkers":
- producing rough animation in TV Paint 
- Animation will be based on the posing, layout, model sheet packs, etc provided by Cartoon Saloon
- Inside TV Paint levels will need to be labeled accordingly to naming conventions set by Cartoon Saloon
- Animation must be consistent and approved by Animation Supervisor and Director
- Weekly quota applies and relates to approved footage
- Previous experience in a similar position is required

Please email your application including links to your online portfolio and/or demo-reel to jobs@cartoonsaloon.ie and specify 'WW_Animator_application_your name" in the Subject.
